description: The command lists trademarks, regsitered at TMCH for a given user and/or its subusers.
availability: All users have access to this command.

paramaters.Definition: Filter results by the trademark name
Filter results by the trademark type
Filter results by the trademark verification status
Index of the first item in the response list

Sort the response list by the following response parameters in ascending or descending order:CREATEDDATECREATEDDATEDESCEXPIRATIONDATEEXPIRATIONDATEDESCIDIDDESCMARKNAMEMARKNAMEDESCMARKTYPEMARKTYPEDESCPOUSTATUSPOUSTATUSDESCSTATUSSTATUSDESCUPDATEDDATEUPDATEDDATEDESCUSERUSERDESC
Depth of the list, may be SELF, SUBUSER or ALL
Limit the search with an earliest trademark registration date
Limit the search with a latest trademark registration date
Limit the search with an earliest trademark update date
Limit the search with a latest trademark update date
Limit the search with an earliest trademark expiration date
Limit the search with a latest trademark expiration date
